summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A TEGOL OUTLAW MOTORCYCLE HELMET, MODEL: V530, SIZE: MEDIUM. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 17E015000 (EQUIPMENT). THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AT 1-866-371-0281 APPROXIMATELY TWO MONTHS AGO. THE CONTACT LEFT THE REQUIRED VOICEMAIL FOR A CALL BACK, BUT HAD NOT RECEIVED A RESPONSE. IN ADDITION, THE CONTACT SENT AN E-MAIL TO TEGOLINC@GMAIL.COM, BUT NO RESPONSE WAS PROVIDED. THE CONTACT RECEIVED A REPLY FOR FED-EX MAILING, BUT HAD NOT RECEIVED THE RETURN STICKER. THE CONTACT FELT A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME HAD PASSED FOR THE RECALL REMEDY. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
